newsitem.title: USA: Two women abducted, killed in Tennessee robbery.
newsitem.headline: Two women abducted, killed in Tennessee robbery.

text.p: Police said Thursday they had found the bodies of two young women abducted during a robbery at the ice cream store where they worked.
The bodies of Angela Holmes, 21, manager of the shop, and her 16-year-old employee, Michelle Mace, a high school sophomore, were found in the Dunbar Cave nature area near Clarksville.
Police had searched all night for the two after a member of Mace's family came to pick her up at closing time Wednesday night and found the door unlocked and the safe door open.
Police said the women's purses were left in the store and the manager's car was also still there, but the store's receipts were missing. Clarksville is about 50 miles northwest of Nashville.
